GovPagesInfo.label: This is an official website of the Government of the Dominican Republic
GovPagesInfo.buttonText: Here's how you can verify it
GovPagesInfo.domainLabel: A .gob.do, .gov.do, or .mil.do site signifies that it belongs to an official organization of the Dominican State.
GovPagesInfo.secureDomainTitle: Secure official websites use HTTPS with .gob.do, .gov.do, or .mil.do domains
GovPagesInfo.secureDomainLabel: A padlock (ðŸ”’) or https:// indicates that you are connected to a secure site within .gob.do or .gov.do. Share confidential information only on secure sites of .gob.do or gov.do.

DominicanRepublic.name: Dominican Republic
DominicanRepublic.govForm: Democratic, representative, and presidential system of government

BusinessFacilitation.title: We assist you in your business processes in the country
BusinessFacilitation.paragraph1: Our goal is to promote and facilitate business initiatives in the Dominican Republic.
BusinessFacilitation.paragraph2: We provide comprehensive services to all investors, exporters, and buyers at no cost.

ProdominicanaTV.title: ProDominicana TV
ProdominicanaTV.subtitle: will broadcast the remaining episodes on the last Sundays of each month at 3:00 p.m. on Channel 4RD
ProdominicanaTV.description: An audiovisual space aimed at promoting domestic producers, exporters, and potential exporters, as well as attracting investments and showcasing the best our country has to offer.

CEO.name: Biviana Riveiro
CEO.title: Executive Director of the Center for Export and Investment of the Dominican Republic
CEO.description: We aim to provide our exporters with trade facilitation services through participation in fairs and trade missions worldwide, business rounds with international buyers, and productive linkage agendas.
